meanings.definition: A gambling game similar to baccarat.
meanings.sent1: During the party, they played banco with excitement.
meanings.sent2: In the casino, many people enjoy playing banco.
meanings.sent3: The dogs decided to have a friendly game of banco.
meanings.sent4: His luck at banco was like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the casino beckoned him to the banco table.

meanings.sent1: She deposited her savings in the banco down the street.
meanings.sent2: The banco helped him secure a loan for his new car.
meanings.sent3: The banco was so busy that the teller mixed up the transactions.
meanings.sent4: The growth of the small business was supported by the banco.
meanings.sent5: The security at the banco made customers feel safe about their money.

meanings.definition: A type of bench or table.
meanings.sent1: They sat on the banco in the park to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent2: The picnic area had a sturdy banco for families to use.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel found a cozy spot on the banco.
meanings.sent4: The old banco in the garden held many memories for the family.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter crafted a beautiful banco for the outdoor space.
